description:
Runs a combination of fmriprep and ciftify pipelines from BIDS specification



DETAILS
Adapted from modules of the Human Connectome
Project's minimal proprocessing pipeline. Please cite:
Glasser MF, Sotiropoulos SN, Wilson JA, Coalson TS, Fischl B, Andersson JL, Xu J,
Jbabdi S, Webster M, Polimeni JR, Van Essen DC, Jenkinson M, WU-Minn HCP Consortium.
The minimal preprocessing pipelines for the Human Connectome Project. Neuroimage. 2013 Oct 15;80:105-24.
PubMed PMID: 23668970; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC3720813.
The default outputs are condensed to include in 4 mesh "spaces" in the following directories:
  + T1w/Native: The freesurfer "native" output meshes
  + MNINonLinear/Native: The T1w/Native mesh warped to MNINonLinear
  + MNINonLinear/fsaverage_LR32k
     + the surface registered space used for fMRI and multi-modal analysis
     + This 32k mesh has approx 2mm vertex spacing
  + MNINonLinear_164k_fs_LR (in the MNINonLinear folder):
     + the surface registered space used for HCP's anatomical analysis
     + This 164k mesh has approx 0.9mm vertex spacing
In addition, the optional flag '--resample-to-T1w32k' can be used to output an
additional T1w/fsaverage_LR32k folder that occur in the HCP Consortium Projects.
These outputs can be critical for those building masks for DWI tract tracing.
By default, some to the template files needed for resampling surfaces and viewing
flatmaps will be symbolic links from a folder ($CIFTIFY_WORKDIR/zz_templates) to the
subject's output folder. If the --no-symlinks flag is indicated, these files will be
copied into the subject folder insteadself.
Written by Erin W Dickie
name: INSERT_NAME

inputs.name: bids dir
inputs.description: The directory with the input dataset formattedaccording to the BIDS standard.

inputs.name: output dir
inputs.description: The directory where the output files should be stored.If you are running ciftify on a partially run analyses see below.

inputs.name: analysis level
inputs.description: Analysis level to run (participant or group)

inputs.name: no symlinks
inputs.description: Will not create symbolic links to the zz_templates folder

inputs.name: rerun if incomplete
inputs.description: Will delete and rerun ciftify workflows if incomplete outputs are found.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.description: Verbose logging

inputs.name: session label
inputs.description: String or Comma separated list of sessions to process. Defaults to all.

inputs.name: older fmriprep
inputs.description: Read from fmriprep derivatives that are version 1.1.8 or older

inputs.name: read from derivatives
inputs.description: Indicates pre-ciftify will be read from the indicated derivatives path and freesurfer/fmriprep will not be run

inputs.name: anat only
inputs.description: Only run the anatomical pipeline.

inputs.name: fmriprep workdir
inputs.description: Path to working directory for fmriprep

inputs.name: fs license
inputs.description: The freesurfer license file

inputs.name: ignore fieldmaps
inputs.description: Will ignore available fieldmaps and use syn-sdc for fmriprep

inputs.name: task label
inputs.description: String or Comma separated list of fmri tasks to process. Defaults to all.

inputs.name: func preproc dirname
inputs.description: Name derivatives folder where func derivatives are found [default: fmriprep]

inputs.name: MSM config
inputs.description: EXPERT OPTION. The path to the configuration file to use for MSMSulc mode. By default, the configuration file is ciftify/data/hcp_config/MSMSulcStrainFinalconf This setting is ignored when not running MSMSulc mode.

inputs.name: participant label
inputs.description: String or Comma separated list of participants to process. Defaults to all.

inputs.name: fmriprep args
inputs.description: Additional user arguments that may be added to fmriprep stages

inputs.name: func preproc desc
inputs.description: The bids desc tag [default: preproc] assigned to the preprocessed file

inputs.name: n cpus
inputs.description: Number of cpu's available. Defaults to the value of the OMP_NUM_THREADS environment variable

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: Debug logging in Erin's very verbose style

inputs.name: ciftify conf
inputs.description: EXPERT OPTION. Path to a yaml configuration file. Overrides the default settings in ciftify/data/ciftify_workflow_settings.yaml

inputs.name: surf reg
inputs.description: Registration sphere prefix [default: MSMSulc]

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: Print help

inputs.name: dry run
inputs.description: Dry run

inputs.name: SmoothingFWHM
inputs.description: Full Width at Half MAX for optional fmri cifti smoothing

inputs.name: no SDC
inputs.description: Will not do fmriprep distortion correction at all (NOT recommended)

inputs.name: resample to T1w32k
inputs.description: Resample the Meshes to 32k Native (T1w) Space
